auto_layout_confirm_text: Auto-layout will overwrite saved node positions. Cancel to keep current positions or Reorder to apply automatic layout.
unlock_delete_confirm_text: Do you really want to delete this item?
unlock_select_description: Select an item from the list on the left to edit its configuration.
unlock_setnavi_hint: Optional: NSPanel page to open on unlock — must be the page's uniqueName.
nav_next_tooltip: If Next points to a page whose Prev points to a different page, this page will be inserted and the next and prev of the other pages adjusted accordingly. In conflicts, prev has priority.
nav_prev_tooltip: If Prev points to a page whose Next points to a different page, this page will be inserted and the next and prev of the other pages adjusted accordingly. In conflicts, prev has priority.
No_data: No data - Adapter might be offline or no panel configured.
